Returns the name of the User currently logged on the server.

Returns the List of User's followers.

Returns the friend request duration, in milliseconds.
getFriendRequestDurationString() - Static method in class simplesocial.server.User
Returns the friend request duration, in PnDTnHnMn.nS format (ISO-8601 standard).
getFriendsList() - Method in class simplesocial.client.Client
Retrieves current User's friends list from the server.
getFriendsList() - Method in class simplesocial.server.User
Returns the List of the names of User's friends.

getLogDurationString() - Static method in class simplesocial.server.OnlineUsers
Returns the login duration, in milliseconds.

Converts an Integer to its corresponding Operation.
getPost() - Method in class simplesocial.Post
Returns the content of the Post.
getPosts() - Method in class simplesocial.client.Client
Returns a queue of Post, in order of arrival.
getRequests() - Method in class simplesocial.client.Client
Returns the list of friend requests (String objects representing the name of the User that made the request).
getUnreadPosts() - Method in class simplesocial.server.User
Returns a List of received and unread posts.
getUserAddress(String) - Method in class simplesocial.server.OnlineUsers
Returns the SocketAddress of the User with the given username.
getUserAddress(User) - Method in class simplesocial.server.OnlineUsers
Returns the SocketAddress of the given User user.

getUsername() - Method in class simplesocial.server.User
